entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: It looks like this is turning into something far more sinister than a simple crash landing. You still haven't found the survivors and the creatures the scientist's datapad referred to are reappearing with uncanny regularity.
entries.journal_entry_description: When you arrived at the crash site there were no passengers. Apparently they have already departed in an attempt to reach Nashal. Catch up to the crew and help them in any way you can.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The dead crew member's datapad that you found at the crash site listed an area at which the survivors had planned to make camp. Go to that location and see if you can help the survivors in any way.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: You don't see the survivors anywhere in the camp, then? Ok. Take care of the creatures and search the camp for any information concerning the creatures or the survivors.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've found the shipwreck survivor's camp, though it looks abandoned and overrun with different kinds of those creatures you saw at the crash site.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Contact Taarna With Location Of Camp
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You need to clear the camp of both kinds of these new spider creatures before you can look for information.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You need to clear the camp of both kinds of these new spider creatures before you can look for information.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The creatures have overrun the survivor's camp. You'll need to clear them out before you can start looking for information.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Destroy the Creatures Infesting the Camp
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You've cleared out most of the creatures from the camp. Take a look around and see if you can find any clues that might lead to the fate of the crash survivors.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You found a datapad and were able to download the following information; Journal Entry 3.58.744: The nymph arachne have completed their first molt. I have recorded brood II characteristics in many of the creatures seen near the camp, soon they will start to exhibit their special attack features. The ship's crew are doing their best to protect us and the wounded, but every night the arachne take one or two more of them. Captain Narl has issued tracking emitters for everyone to wear. One of the behavioral engineer's complained that it really wouldn't make a difference, but for the most part everyone knew why we are wearing the emitters.
entries.task06_message_box_text: Journal Entry 3.58.744: The nymph arachne have completed their first molt. I have recorded brood II characteristics in many of the creatures seen near the camp; they have started to exhibit their new special attack features. The ship's crew are doing their best to protect us and the wounded, but every night the arachne take one or two more of them. Captain Narl has issued tracking emitters for everyone to wear. One of the behavioral engineers complained that it really wouldn't make a difference, but for the most part everyone knew why we are wearing the emitters.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: The scientist's datapad mentioned that all of the crash survivors are wearing tracking emitters. If you could find a tracking device that was left behind you could use it to find the rest of the crew.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: You were able to find a tracking device amidst the abandoned supplies. Unfortunately, it appears to be security encoded and all attempts to slice it have failed. Search the camp's supplies and see if you can find the password.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: What is left of CV-4T was able to tell you the password to the tracking device.
entries.task09_journal_entry_title: Use the Password on the Tracking Device
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: The range on the tracking device is not very far, but was able to pick up some emitter signals nearby. Head to these coordinates and see if you can find the survivors.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You need to clear the cave of the creatures before you can go in and look for the surviving crew members.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You need to clear the cave of the creatures before you can go in and look for the surviving crew members.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: The signal seems to be coming from inside the cave. Kill enough of the creatures to be able to go into the cave and investigate.
entries.task13_journal_entry_title: Kill the Creatures Guarding the Cave
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Search the cave for the surviving crew members.
